parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of selected entities to use to create this reference plane

title: IRefPlaneFeatureData.IGetSelections
description: Gets the selected entities used to create this reference plane feature.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of selected entities to use to create this reference plane

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of entities of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IRefPlaneFeatureData::GetSelectionsCount
to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
IMPORTANT:
Reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2010 or later are constraint based; reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2009 or earlier are not. See the
Remarks
section in the
IRefPlaneFeatureData interface
topic for details about reference planes and this interface.
